defaultMessage: First you need to register. Once registered, you can request to join the workspace.
Sorry, an error occurred. Please refresh your browser and contact {supportEmail} if the condition persists.
Welcome to {appName}. Please login with the password that you received in the welcome email.
Sorry, an error occurred while processing your invitation. Please contact {supportEmail}.
Sorry, the workspace to which you were invited was not found. Please contact {supportEmail} if you think this is an error.
Sorry, the invitation you received was not found. Please contact {supportEmail} if you think this is an error.
Sorry, the invitation you received was expired. Please contact {supportEmail} if you think this is an error.
